pr_title: Report all block & attestation production attempts to performance tracker

timeline.message: Report all block & attestation production attempts to performance tracker

timeline.bodyText: This is in the Validator Client, and it has just produced and sent to the beacon node the attestation. It can't know if the beacon node sent it on.  The APIs around this are changing at the moment anyway which may change this, but for now this TODO seems out of scope of this change and probably should be removed.
timeline.author: ajsutton
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -134,6 +134,7 @@ public String getProducedType() {
             signedAttestation ->
                 validatorApiChannel.sendSignedAttestation(
                     signedAttestation, Optional.of(validator.getValidatorIndex())))
+        // TODO: here we report succes for the attestation yet we don't know if it was successful.
